title: Grand Theft Auto VI
description: Grand Theft Auto VI takes players to the state of Leonida, home to the neon-soaked streets of Vice City. The game features dual protagonists Lucia and her partner, marking the first female lead in the mainline series. Set in a modern-day Vice City inspired by Miami, GTA VI promises to deliver the most immersive and ambitious open world Rockstar has ever created.
storyline: Return to Vice City in an all-new adventure featuring Lucia and her partner as they navigate the criminal underworld of Leonida.

title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake
Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis
description: Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis is a reimagining of Lara Croft’s 1996 genre-defining game with visuals powered by Unreal Engine 5, modern gameplay, and new surprises that honor the spirit of the original.

title: Ace Combat 8: Wings of Theve
description: Soar through the skies and rise above every challenge to earn your place among the elite. Engage in intense aerial combat to dominate the battlefield with powerful weapons. Experience a breathtaking campaign filled with high-stakes missions, hard choices, and deep squad connections.
storyline:
You're a fighter pilot, adrift at sea in a rescue boat until the outdated aircraft carrier, Endurance, pulls you aboard. Your homeland's navy is shattered. The aging vessel, its decks crowded with refugees, has already retreated far from the front lines.

July 2029: The Federation of Central Usea (FCU) has fallen under a lightning invasion by the Republic of Sotoa. Most of the nation is occupied, the military is scattered, and the Endurance is just one fragment of what remains. On this ship, you

title: Diablo IV: Lord of Hatred
description: Sanctuary reaches its breaking point. In Diablo IV: Lord of Hatred, Mephisto’s dark crusade threatens the heart of Sanctuary. Rise as new heroes, uncover the fate of old allies, and forge your legend in the next chapter of the critically acclaimed action-RPG.

similarGames.name: Nights of Azure 2: Bride of the New Moon

title: Marvel Rivals: Season 6 - Night at Museum
Genshin Impact: Version "Luna IV"
description:
Version "Luna IV" of Genshin Impact, also known as "Song of the Welkin Moon: Interlude". This update includes:
• New characters: Columbina, Zibai, and Illuga
• New main story quests
• New updates for Miliastra Wonderland
• New QoL, and more!

title: Megastore Simulator
description: Megastore Simulator is a first-person management & tycoon game. Start small and grow into a massive two-floor megastore with forklifts, pallet jacks, and staff. Unlock and run Bakery, Clothing, Electronics, Sports, Music, Toy & Grocery departments.

title: Party Party Anxiety!
description: A dating card game for anxious people. Use conversation cue cards up your sleeves to make connections. But beware—the more anxious you get, the scarier they become.

title: Project Killdance
description: Project KILLDANCE is a Noir tactical action featuring a one-army strategy and instant-death combat. Slowly observe surroundings, choreograph each killing move, leave no survivor, and become the spectral death.

title: Convenience Store Simulator
description: A game about running and managing your own convenience store. Actively work the register, master stock and inventory, make and sell coffee, hire unique staff, and fully decorate your space. Strategically expand your business and play special mini-games for prizes.

title: Relative Frame
description: Explore space in a hand crafted, physics based universe, with immersive sound and atmosphere. Fight and board ships, collect rare cargo, and upgrade your ship.

title: Dune: Awakening - Raiders of the Broken Lands
description: Raiders of the Broken Lands DLC features a cosmetic pack inspired by the Smugglers of the Imperium. Customize your base with 74 building pieces and 17 decorations, and take the smuggler style into the desert with new armor, weapon, and vehicle variants, a cosmetic swatch, and emotes.

title: Trinket Bag Maker
description: Trinket Bag Maker is a retro sandbox game inspired by the 2000's girl games, where you can create your own trinket bag! Choose between many adorable charms and bags to create the trinket bag of your dreams!

title: Dino Party
description: a chaotic multiplayer brawler packed with silly physics, unpredictable minigames, and over-the-top dino action.
storyline: Welcome to Dino Party, a multiplayer brawler where classic party-game chaos meets fast, punchy combat. Grab your friends—online or on the couch—and dive into a wild party full of silly physics, unpredictable minigames, and over-the-top dinosaur action!

title: Bruisers 2D Boxing
description:
Step into the ring and fight your way to the top in Bruisers 2D Boxing — a gritty, retro-styled boxing RPG where every punch counts and every decision shapes your career.

Welcome to the unforgiving world of professional boxing. Build your legacy from the ground up — train hard, fight smart, and manage the life of an up-and-coming fighter chasing glory. With in-depth 2D boxing action and a rich career mode, Bruisers 2D Boxing captures the raw intensity of the sport like never before.

similarGames.name: Anima: Gate of Memories - The Nameless Chronicles

title: It's Fine
description: It’s Fine is an active incremental/upgrade clicker game about releasing v1.0 of your game on time.
storyline: The Publisher moved the deadline. You have 24 hours to ship Version 1.0. Survive the indie dev crunch in this active incremental. Generate code with GPUs, radioactive squirrels, and a literal Kraken. Stack 100s of upgrades, trust your dog Joe, and grind until it compiles. It's Fine!

title: Glue Blocks
description: Glue your falling blocks to create your own shapes and achieve monster scores in wells of all shapes with dynamic gravity. Compete with friends or have funds in coop. And unleash your own creativity with the mode and well editor!

title: Bounce95
description: Incremental game where you bounce balls on stages you create

title: Word95
description: Play word games and get points to build a dictionary one word at a time

title: Trees Hate You
description: Hike through the worst forest full of the most horrible trees. Do not trust them. The trees will trick you. They will bully you. They will hurt you. If only you could find an axe...

title: Curse Chapter: Dawnthief
description: Plunder all the treasure worth taking from the exotic wilderness with your band of rogues. Jump, kick and sling your chain mace to smash and climb your way through any obstacle. Face off against beasts and hopeful heroes that rise up to stop you.
storyline:
Travel north into the wilderness with your team to undermine diplomatic relations and steal the rumored treasures sealed away there. Overcome local fauna, wild hearthen warriors and even elite knights posted to protect all that is hidden away in this mystic overgrown land. Here under the shade of the great soul tree much waits to be uncovered all for you to steal it. Venture forth Dawnthief and take the greatest treasure of the worlds tyrant.

Play as the enigmatic and quiet Dawn Clown and work

title: Dzyun Battle 2026
description: Strafe, jump, and battle for holiday supremacy! Join Team Santa or Team Krampus in high-speed New Year PvP!

title: Neidfyre
description: Neidfyre is a turn-based duel game forged in fire and steel. Step into a cursed land of no escape. Survive against those who stand in your way and fulfill your purpose.

title: Auto Snakes in Outer Space
description: A hypnotic incremental idler where you manage colorful snakes. Watch them collect food, then spend the food on upgrades and abilities for your colony.
storyline:
Auto Snakes in Outer Space is a mesmerizing incremental snake idler, where your snakes automatically find their own food. The player's goal is to make them more efficient.

Collect food, then spend it to unlock abilities, upgrades, and ability upgrades.

Increase your snakes’ speed and food supply. Complete tasks to unlock new skins. Maximize your upgrades and reach your colony’s full potential.

title: Fate Architect
description: Fate Architect is a roguelike deckbuilder where you build and modify symbols on a slot machine to earn points and shape your strategy. Each run offers new combinations, synergies, and challenges as you design the ultimate slot machine of fate.

title: Orium
description: Aboard your ship, exterminate the enemies of profit, exploit planets and expand the corporation’s commercial empire across the stars. Orium is a roguelite infused with streamlined 4X elements.
storyline: The universe is dying, galaxy after galaxy but capitalism won’t wait. On board your ship, your employer S-corp expects you to meet revenue targets by exploiting every star system in your path. After all, just because the stars are fading away doesn’t mean business has to stop.

title: Simpli Casa
description: Welcome to Simpli Casa, the chill and addictive decorating game where minimalism meets maximum style!

title: Cute Finders
description: Your mission starts now! Objective? Find the subtle, silly, and sneaky differences between the two images displayed!

similarGames.name: Hayama Reiko no Date de Blackjack

title: Feast of the Beast: Unleashed
description: "Top-down action and survival shooter, playable solo or cooperatively. Explore Valachia with your brother and face off against humans, lycanthropes, and rival vampire clans as you advance towards the origin of TOX-Z, the toxin that consumes the world."
storyline:
Welcome to Valachia, a region devastated by the arrival of TOX-Z, an alien substance capable of rewriting life, blood, and consciousness. When the plague erupted and humans fell, the monsters living in the shadows were forced into the light.

In this new order, three vampire clans dispute control of the night:

Strigoi, masters of digital espionage and mental manipulation.

Asanbosam, warriors fused with steel and biotechnology.

Vetala, scientists capable of moving between bodies and challengin

title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - Sea of Sorrow
description: Voyage across and beneath the salt-stricken seas in this thrilling nautically-themed expansion of Hollow Knight: Silksong, free for all players in 2026!

title: Inferno Protocol
description: Trapped in a deadly labyrinth, you and 5 friends must scavenge, craft, and survive. Harvest monster parts for gear, inject experimental syringes to gain unique skills, and navigate trap-filled corridors. In this 6-player horror survival, you must evolve to escape.
storyline:
INFERNO PROTOCOL takes place in a vast and deadly labyrinth that supports up to 6 players, spanning an enormous area roughly equivalent to 22,000 football fields. Every corner of this structure is different, confronting you with mind-bending situations. The most important rule to reaching the exit is simple: survive.

You don’t know why you’re here or who brought you. All you know is that something is deeply wrong with this massive structure. Curved walls, impossible corridors, and an unexplaina

title: Highway Noir
description: You are an underground driver for hire, fired from the Major Crimes Agency. Rush through a busy city at night as you take on high speed getaways, dangerous street races, white knuckle pursuits and more. Don't stop until you reveal the truth about who wanted you gone

title: Joint Force
description: Solve challenging puzzles to reunite Belcho and Nim.

title: Anxiety Arcade
description: Anxiety Arcade is a short, surreal narrative game about living with anxiety — and how it feels when your own thoughts turn into puzzles.

title: Thirsty Princess
description: Thirsty Princess is a fast-paced, top-down party game for 2–4 local players where you and your friends compete to drink beer with an impatient and unreasonable princess. Get drunk and slowly lose control while you brawl, steal from and sabotage your friends to win the favour of your princess.

title: D.A.D.S.
description: Use your special ops units to construct base facilities and towers to protect them from the ever-increasing threat of alien invaders in this Tower Defense game with a city-building element! Research their weaknesses and develop defenses before mankind runs out of time.

title: Morbid Mailroom
description: In a claymation prison for occult offenders, you are the package inspector. Search packages for hidden contraband, coded letters, and cursed objects. Balance duty, compassion, and survival as you decide what reaches the inmates and what burns in the incinerator. Your choices cannot be undone.

title: Stunted Gravity
description: Stunted Gravity is a hovercraft stunt-driving game set in a neon-dystopian future. Race, jump, and improvise lines across arenas where gravity pulls in any and every direction. Execute stunts, evade hazards, and battle enemy drones as you pilot though the interplanetary Stunted Gravity Circuit.

title: Don Pepe y sus globos
description: Don Pepe y sus globos is a multiplayer party game where up to 4 players can duke it out... with water balloons! Reload, avoid and throw to fight - whoever's still dry at the end wins!

title: Beandejo
description: BEANDEJO is an action-packed spin-gun roguelite. Enter the Old West, where the cattle roam, and drunken vegetables terrorize the local saloons. Spin your gun, time your draws, and gun them down to become the toughest sheriff in town!

title: Ephemeral Frame
description: Step inside picture frames, films, and other imagery that connect a variety of dreamscapes in this surreal first-person exploration game.

title: Dragon Dinner
description: Cute but chaotic restaurant simulator where you play as a dragon waiter in a fast-paced dining rush. Set tables, serve hungry dragons, deliver the right dishes, and keep the place clean! After each day, customize the layout of the restaurant and learn new abilities to improve.

title: Midnight Billiards
description: Midnight Billiards is a turn-based roguelite game inspired by Peglin and billiards. Choose from a variety of characters and collect items to build your unique strategy. Aim carefully and make the perfect shot to defeat your opponents!

title: Paddlenoid
description: Paddlenoid is a fun brick breaker you can play solo or with a friend. There’s nothing out of the ordinary and absolutely no reason to suspect a deeper purpose. Just have a good time and remember to ignore the crystals!

title: Dyadem
description: Become the greatest tactician in this love letter to classic handheld SRPGs. It falls to you to forge the bonds of your Prince's followers, develop their skills, and shape their strategies as you fight to reclaim your homeland and save the world.

title: Bag of Dreams
description: Bag of dreams is the cozy card-based Roguelike Dreambuilder you didn't know you needed. Can you piece together the perfect sleep, one fragment at a time?
storyline:
Draw dream fragments from your bag and transform your Dream Space into a peaceful, safe vessel to carry you into the next night... Just make sure you watch out for the night terrors and other dangers, of course!

With a near-endlessly replayable core loop, hundreds of synergies and plenty of nightmares to keep you in check, Bag of Dreams offers a refreshing take on immersive deckbuilding with tons of heart and a cosy, welcoming art style to match.

Will you build cautiously, or gamble everything

title: Memoware
description: Memoware! A small adventure, exploration and puzzle videogame.
storyline:
You're an archaeologist named Aria, who was called by a friend to solve secrets and whereabouts of a mysterious mountain people which this friend lived in the past.

However, mysteriously, everyone disappeared without a trace.

And how you'll uncover this? Using MEMOWARE, memory tool and with a little help from the tiny Minny, that will follow you in your journey. Uncover secrets, stories, movements, reasons and motivations.

After collecting sufficient memories, your biggest challenge will be t

title: Highguard
description: From the creators of Apex Legends and Titanfall, comes Highguard: a PvP raid shooter where players will ride, fight, and raid as Wardens, arcane gunslingers sent to fight for control of a mythical continent.

title: Star Wars: Galactic Racer
description: STAR WARS: Galactic Racer is a runs-based, high-stakes reinvention of racing born in the lawless Outer Rim. With the Empire gone and the galaxy rebuilding, The Galactic League is created: an underground, unsanctioned circuit where syndicates bankroll chaos and champions are forged.

title: Hitman 3: Patient Zero Requiem
description: In this new mission, Agent 47 is tasked with the elimination of Lilith Devereux, the ambitious prospective CEO of Ether Corporation. A relative newcomer in the world of the high and mighty, Devereux’s rapid ascent has followed the mysterious deaths of her predecessor Neleis De Waal and chief scientists Silvio Caruso and Francesca De Santis. Her meteoric rise has been generously supported by Gregory Carlisle. For this mission, Agent 47 will visit the Carlisle Estate, based in the Dartmoor locatio

title: Where Winds Meet: The Imperial Palace
Orbitals
description: Team up as Maki and Omura, two inseparable explorers with a whole lot more determination than experience. You’ll brave the perils of space in search of help for their crumbling station home, now trapped within a supernatural cosmic storm.

title: Order of the Sinking Star
description: From director Jonathan Blow (Braid, The Witness), Order of the Sinking Star is a narrative adventure set in a realm of magic and enigma. Solve over 1000 interconnected, hand-crafted puzzles, discover unique playable heroes, master evolving gameplay mechanics, and decipher a grand mystery.

title: Ontos
description: A sci-fi mystery set on the repurposed moon hotel Samsara. Uncover cryptic experiments, face unsettling encounters, and piece together a mind-bending narrative. The deeper you go, the more the truth unravels as you confront the ultimate question: What is reality?

title: Stupid Never Dies
description:
Set in a monster-ruled otherworldly dungeon, Stupid Never Dies puts you in control of Davy, a timid zombie living at the very bottom of monster society. Defeat enemies, level up, and collect strange items to grow stronger on your quest to bring Julia, a frozen human girl, back to life.

Steal enemy abilities, customize your undead body with bizarre upgrades, and experience fast-paced combat packed with innovation.
storyline: Werewolves, Lizardmen, Skeletons— In a world where monsters are part of everyday life, a bottom-rung zombie named Davy braves a deadly dungeon to bring back Julia, the frozen human he loved. Gear up for a delightfully wild, "BLAZING FAST GROWTH" action RPG—Stupid Never Dies!

title: TankRat
description: A dying world, flesh given way to steel. Swarms of corrupted mech-monsters roam a desolated land. Search and destroy, scavenge and dismantle, rebuild yourself from the wreckage. What you take becomes what you are. Survive the wasteland. Make it to Highpoint.

title: Decrepit
description: Decrepit is a first-person action game with souls-like combat where every death drags you back into the depths. Learn the dungeon, master the combat, and find your way out of the forsaken castle.

title: Tri6: Infinite 2
description: Tri6: Infinite 2 is futuristic arcade racing without brakes: race across procedurally generated cyber tracks, dodge traps, use power-ups, and experience thrilling high-speed action. Every run is unique — how long can you last?

title: FamCram
description: FamCram is a 3D grid-based puzzle game about two dads putting their kids to bed. Guide the children through increasingly challenging and multicultural settings, each with unique items, mechanics, and humor.

title: Signal Zone
description: Build, mine, and defend your base to survive the nights. Gather resources by day, reinforce your defenses, and survive attacks in this challenging minimalist strategy.

title: Time Travel Train
description: Time Travel Train is a roguelite incremental game about commanding a weaponized locomotive through history. Battle enemies, and upgrade your train to become an unstoppable force. Your train never stops moving. Keep it fueled, destroy everything in your path, and collect scrap from the wreckage.

title: Crimson Freedom
description: A classic RTS with modern look - Crimson Freedom is a gripping real-time strategy game featuring a thrilling campaign experience. Set on 22nd-century Mars, the game follows the epic struggle of ideologies battling for supremacy over the red planet.

title: Fortunato
description: Draw a pair of aces, use them as poker hands or to eliminate your opponents? A poker roguelike battle card game. Build a deck of jokers, defeat bosses, modify cards, and conquer challenges across the ever-changing islands. At the table of four, win by chips or remaining health, your call...

title: PinKeep
description: PinKeep is a pinball deckbuilding roguelite – use the ball and flippers to collect resources and defeat your enemies! Place buildings from your deck on the playfield to defend your Keep. Create powerful synergies to eradicate the hordes of attacking Knights!

title: Without a Hitch
description: Without a Hitch is a co-op delivery game where you collect and transport cargo across a chaotic and perilous landscape. Whether traveling solo or in a convoy of 2 to 4 players, the package must arrive before the sun sets, and THEY come for it. Can you make it Without a Hitch?

title: Winx Club: The Magic Is Back
description: Winx Club: The Magic is Back captures the essence of the Winx universe, delivering an enchanting experience with a mix of magical combat and puzzle-solving. Play as all six members of the Winx Club, each with their own magical abilities.

title: Gear.Club Unlimited 3
description: The Gear.Club series is back! Customize and set up your favourite cars to race at top speed along the roads of the French Mediterranean coast and Japan. Don't just win – show off your style!

title: Suncraft
description: A cozy village crafting adventure where you gather resources, refine materials, and build to unlock new technologies across evolving zones in a charming pixel-art world.
storyline:
Suncraft is a cozy village crafting adventure set in a charming pixel art world full of life, mystery, and warmth.
Take part in rebuilding a quiet land that is waiting to come alive again, a place where every crafted tool, planted seed, and helping hand makes a difference.

As the newest villager, you will gather, build, and grow alongside friends who each have their own stories to tell.
The forests hide old memories, the mountains hold forgotten paths, and the fields slowly return to life as yo

title: Kingdom's Return: Time-Eating Fruit and the Ancient Monster
description: A kingdom-rebuilding adventure filled with action and strategy! Kingdom's Return is an action RPG where you'll adventure to restore your fallen kingdom. Collect materials in 2D side-scrolling adventure stages, then use them in the strategy part to rebuild your kingdom and power up your characters!

title: R-Type Dimensions III
description: Building on the legacy of R-Type Dimensions and R-Type Dimensions EX, Dimensions III has been completely re-envisioned with cutting-edge visuals and sounds, expanded gameplay modes, and a range of new features designed to deliver the most definitive modern edition of R-Type’s classic era.

title: Sheol no Mori: Tasogare no Majuuzukai
Safo and The Moon Warriors
description: In a world where the sun no longer rises, Prince Safo must rescue his sister from Argus, a mysterious one-eyed monster. Joined by diverse companions, this adventure RPG features beautiful illustrations and a novel-like story as players uncover secrets in this sunless world.

title: The Plant Shop
description: A cozy horror game where you craft plants for late-night customers while you manage a small plant shop. Expand your plant collection, upgrade your shop & grow your business.
storyline: You play as Silvia, a 26 years old girl who decides to open her own small plant shop on a late-night shift because she has a corporate job during the day.

title: Frog Sqwad
description: Storm The Sewers for the glory of the Swamp King! Swing, jump, catapult your friends, and eat eat EAT until you grow into a humongous Megafrog. A co-op extraction puzzle-platformer for up to 8 players. Squad up with your frog friends for a friendslop party in this slapstick physics adventure!

title: Iron Colony
description: After crash-landing on a mysterious island, confront hostile robotic creatures in intense combat and strategic duels. Explore forgotten ruins, uncover secrets, and fight for survival in a world where corrupted technology dominates every corner.

title: Astromine
description: Astromine is a co-op survival game about scavenging fully destructible voxel planets. Land on planets and gather enough materials to fight off alien creatures, build structures and spaceships, and conquer the solar system

title: Virtue and a Sledgehammer
description: Go back to your hometown and tear it down with a sledgehammer in this narrative exploration game. Confront your past in a devastating story about feeling like you no longer belong in the place you grew up.

title: Humanity Echo: Cyberpunk Tactical RPG
description:
A tactical turn-based RPG set in a cyberpunk world struggling to adapt to techno-catastrophes and evolving viruses. You lead a squad of diverse specialists in a city controlled by ruthless corporations and warring factions.

Unlike traditional tactics games that rely on RNG, the combat system emphasizes readable depth and deterministic outcomes. Victory depends on mastering interactive environments, managing scarce resources like propellant and medgel, and exploiting a complex stealth and noise
storyline: Odesa, 2044. In a coastal megacity torn by corporate warfare, you are not a soldier - you are an engineer. Your life shatters when your father vanishes and the ruthless Prospect Corporation begins weaponizing his ecological research for mass control. To find him and save the city’s future, you must assemble a resistance squad, sabotage corporate systems, and navigate shifting alliances where your choices echo across the districts.

title: Fall Asleep
description: Fall Asleep is a tense first-person climbing game where you’re trapped in a nightmare and the only way out is up. See only the platforms in front of you, make every jump count, and try to escape before the dream swallows you whole.

title: Terminator: Dark Fate - Defiance: Evolution
description: Evolution is the next major story expansion for Terminator: Dark Fate – Defiance, the gritty real-time strategy experience set in the dark future of Dark Fate.

title: Starship Troopers: Terran Command - The Eradicators
description: The Eradicators is the first Battle Group DLC for Starship Troopers: Terran Command, focusing exclusively on new Territory Mode content.

title: Panzer Corps 2: Allied Operations - Italy: Vol.1
description: Lead the Allied invasion of Sicily in the opening chapter of a grand trilogy. Command British and American forces across two converging campaigns, carry your veteran core army forward, and relive the historic push that broke open Fortress Europe.

title: Broken Arrow: Baltic Battalion
description: The first specialization DLC for Broken Arrow introduces the Baltic Battalion, a brand-new army specialization accessible to the U.S. faction.

title: Retail Hell
description: A horror job simulator set in a convenience store in purgatory. Serve non human customers, fight collapsing inventory, survive curses, and uncover why your shift never ends.

title: Scramble Knights Royale
description: Welcome to Scramble Knights Royale! Compete against fellow knights in a 32-player classic-adventure battle royale. Be the last knight standing and win the favor of the princess!

title: A Date with Death 2: Remnants
description: Train, chat, and flirt your way through the Underworld in this romantic story-driven chat simulator. Create your own Grim Reaper, connect with your team through text and video calls, and decide who you are when the past no longer defines you in a sequel to A Date with Death!

title: Bento Blocks
description: Craft delicious lunch boxes in this cozy-yet-challenging ingredient-cutting puzzle game.

title: Go Phish
description: Go Fish or go homeless. In this rogue-ish debt-builder, pay your rent by phishing a target in a supercharged version of the classic card game. Crack your victims password in a dynamic dialogue system, then use your loadout of unlockable suits and items to hack their PC and drain their savings.

title: Factory 95
description: Factory 95 is a retro Windows inspired puzzle-automation game about making a slide show factory… in a slide show! Manage your space, make increasingly complex slides and worry about Y2K in this minimalistic factory builder.

title: Odd Jobs: On The Lot
description: A physics-powered, 1-4 player co-op set in a vibrant Australian carpark. Teammates race to complete a rotating roster of odd jobs avoiding hazards and losing wages. Manage chaos collecting stray trolleys, unloading delivery trucks, cleaning up trash, or delivering groceries directly to car boots.

title: ReStory
description: Run a quaint electronics repair shop in mid-2000s Tokyo. Grow your business by carefully restoring iconic video game consoles, cell phones, music players, and other nostalgic devices. Talk to customers, hear their stories, and see how your decisions impact both their lives and your shop.

title: Find Your Words
description: Find your community at summer camp, one friendship at a time. Take a beat, enjoy a breath of fresh air - all while playing at the beach, strolling in the woods, and dancing with friends. This short cozy game was created by two dads, celebrating their kids’ journeys to find their voices.

title: Thrifty Business
description: Run your very own thrift shop in this laid-back management sim! Sort through boxes to find hidden treasures and arrange nostalgic displays of clothes, antiques, toys & more. Befriend the regulars, help with their requests and expand your store into a hub for the local community!

title: Gate Guard Simulator
description: Step into the boots of the castle guard. Inspect seals, expose smugglers and reveal witches. You decide who enters and who’s turned away. Will you uphold the law, or break it for your own gain?

title: Maze Creep!!
description: A satire co-op horror game where players aim to reach the end of an infinite series of mazes, evading the all-hearing Maze Creep and various other threats.

title: Dunkirk: The Forgotten Soldier
description: Survive the onslaught, rise from the ashes, and become the forgotten soldier history tried to erase.

title: Petunia's Purgatory
description: Petunia’s Purgatory is a creepy-cute, idle-farming game that lives at the bottom of your screen. Plant seeds that grow into horrifying crops, sacrifice animals for blood, and summon assistants to help you run your farm. Manage your sanity while you try to appease the Elder God!

title: Gap Year
description: Gap Year is a story-focused point & click adventure played through comic book panels that reconfigure as you explore Vera Novak’s one-bedroom apartment. Vera is a bright young scientist, but the arrival of an unexpected guest and a strange fixation with a cosmonaut may derail her academic pursuits.

title: Opona
description: The reality TV show Popworld is a one-way ticket to pop stardom, and Mia and Noah came here to win! Fight your way through turn-based dance battles (and a whole lot of drama) in this hand-drawn idol adventure game.

title: Quintillion Quest
description: A fantasy-themed run-based active incremental game

title: Rebel Infernal Path
description: Rebel Infernal Path is a turn-based, command-driven 3D hack-and-slash RPG. Choose from 10 classes to form a party of 4 heroes and 4 summoned monsters. Battle through dazzling dungeons and vast open fields to overthrow a tyrant. Defeat his minions, craft powerful gear, and conquer all 6 stages.
storyline:
Deep in the mountains,veiled by forests and mist,stood a small kingdom.
It was ruled by a ruthless tyrant.
His name—Keith Dachaal.
The king imposed his rulewith violence and greed,looting the people daily andcrushing them beneath his heel.
He burned their fields,imprisoned many without reason,and let fear govern all.
To leave the kingdom,submit quietly,or die and be left to rot.
These were the only choices the people had.

The Day of the Uprising

It was meant to be a glorious ending - a triumph

title: Arcane Merchant
description: Open your own shop in the heart of a Medieval Fantasy realm! Stock your shelves with everything from potions and swords to mysterious crystals and legendary artifacts. Set your prices, earn your customers' trust and become the richest merchant in town!
storyline: Arcane Merchant is a magical store simulation set in the heart of a Medieval Fantasy realm. Explore the town, seize trade opportunities and begin your journey toward wealth. Every decision you make will shape your fortune and the future of your business.

title: Pripyat 0
description: Chernobyl has broken down. As radiation rains down upon you, the world starts rapidly mutating. You've gotten stuck in a nightmarish loop. Can you correctly spot the anomalies on time and get to safety? Or will you become one with the zone?

title: Nature Minds
description:
Nature Minds is an action-adventure RPG where you play as Tareq, a young warrior chosen by the ancient Bracelet of Dilmun. As nature falters and forgotten realms awaken, Tareq discovers that the force behind the world’s disturbance is Gilgamesh—the immortal king who gained endless life through the Plant of Immortality and now seeks to reshape creation according to his vision.

Travel across vast deserts, sunken kingdoms, radiant jungles, and sky cities as you uncover the truth behind the Bracele
storyline: Nature Minds follows Tareq, a warrior drawn into a collapsing world shaped by ancient spirits and forgotten kingdoms. When the Bracelet of Dilmun awakens on his arm, Tareq begins a journey across deserts, jungles, oceans, and sky cities to uncover the truth behind its power. As he faces the fallen spirit kings and confronts Gilgamesh, the immortal ruler of Gilgardia, Tareq discovers that restoring balance may come at the cost of his own fate. Along the way, he will explore the hidden legends of

title: Forks & Daggers
description: A Chaotic Medieval Social Deduction Party Game for 3–10 Players. Find the traitor or become a traitor. Use Manor as a weapon itself; throw, hit, arm trap. Convert to a Dagger to hide and eliminate.
storyline: A Chaotic Medieval Social Deduction Party Game for 3–10 Players. Find the traitor or become a traitor. Use Manor as a weapon itself; throw, hit, arm trap. Convert to a Dagger to hide and eliminate.

title: Starlet Voice
description:
STARLET☆VOICE is a narrative talent-show survival sim set inside a 100-day televised competition. Train skills, build your persona, manage pressure, and form relationships as you navigate weekly episodes shaped by your choices. Public opinion, fan reactions, and on-air risks determine whether you rise in the rankings or fall into the elimination zone.
Featuring five heroines with unique storylines, multiple endings, and a blend of performance, strategy, and visual-novel drama.

title: Line Up!
description: Line Up! is a chaotic, couch multiplayer game where you take on the role of a caring Mama trying to guide your adorable, easily confused little babies lined up through the bustling world. Other critters are doing the same, and they won’t hesitate to defend their little ones with everything they’ve got!

title: Lost in Cheese
description: Lost in Cheese is a brand new puzzle game. Play as Mewton, a cube shaped cat who travels to Roll island. Embark on a cozy adventure filled with cheese. Lots of cheese. Your mission? Push, strategize, and clear the path to the big red button!

title: Guardians Planetfall
description: From the creators of Guardians Frontline, Guardians Planetfall drops you into a galaxy-wide war for the fate of humanity. Fight assembled into squads of up to 4 soldiers in fast, tactical VR combat across space and dangerous planets filled with aliens, Void soldiers, and massive war machines.

title: The Amusement
description: An abandoned amusement park, a tangled memory, a family shattered by the Great War… Discover an intense story in this redirected-walking VR adventure in which every step counts.

title: Alliance Tales: Battle for the Frontier
description: Alliance Tales is a linear, story-driven space combat sim inspired by 90s classics like Wing Commander and Tie Fighter. Take part in fast-paced space battles in a campaign takes you on the search for a missing friend while foiling a plot to take over the Frontier Colonies.

title: The Great Flood
description: "A War you can grasp." An upcoming strategy game, featuring the ability to engage in duels in VR/MR Dual Modes.

title: Catana: Red Flowers
description:
Step into the paws of a nimble ninja cat!

By day, run your chaotic Restaurant, cook dishes, serve quirky guests, and stir up playful mischief.

By night, dash through enemies, deflect bullets, gather resources to grow your Restaurant, and showcase your skills with precision, speed, and style.

title: EXD: Extra Dimensional
description: A delivery guy. A dimensional rift. A quest across another world. Master telekinesis and elemental magic in Erath, where everyday objects become legendary weapons. Battle mythical creatures. Solve ancient puzzles. Uncover dark truths. Advanced VR physics meet epic fantasy adventure.
storyline:
You are Max Ventura, an ordinary delivery guy working for Megazon. When a dimensional rift tears through your warehouse, everything changes. You are pulled into Erath, a fantasy world tainted by ancient relics from Earth.

Armed with the Quantum Glove and the powers granted by the Dimensional Guardians, you must journey across a realm of dragons, mutant creatures, and magic.

Recover lost Earth artifacts, grow stronger, survive deadly traps, and uncover the truth about the First Chosen, a myster

title: Blackjack Roulette
description: Blackjack rogue-like with a Roulette "spin". Purchase Insurance Policies with unique abilities give you the edge while taking on a larger Roulette wheels with even larger Buy-In Costs.

title: Ultrapool
description: The pool bar is always open! Ultrapool is a colorful roguelike about playing pool with a bunch of wacky balls with crazy effects. Carefully craft a perfect build and get the craziest trickshots!

title: Space Trench
description: A survival horror roguelite where you salvage scrap, upgrade your equipment, and fight against countless hordes in the tight corridors of the derelicts of space.

title: Springs, Eternal
description: Explore a mysterious hot springs in the dead of night and meet the other lost souls who are drawn to this place.

title: The House of Hikmah
description: The House of Hikmah is a narrative-driven 3D adventure game exploring grief, legacy and the search for answers after profound loss. Solve puzzles, encounter historical scholars of the Islamic Golden Age, and uncover timeless lessons in a beautifully imagined House of Wisdom.
storyline: In the wake of her father’s death, Maya enters the House of Wisdom, a dreamlike sanctuary filled with centuries of knowledge. By transforming elements with a mysterious device, Maya must solve puzzles to traverse the realms of larger-than-life historical Scholars. Each door she opens uncovers the secrets of her father’s legacy, but behind them lie the shadows Maya may not be ready to face.

title: Dungeons of Dusk
description: Dungeons of DUSK is a classic turn based dungeon crawling RPG that takes place canonically between the episodes of the cult classic FPS. Are you... WORTHY?

title: Cave Oasis at Shylake
description: Move to a small cave town on a moon in this hopeful futuristic life sim. Try hydroponic farming, sustainable biomass crafting, mix-and-match cooking and decorating, and more. Befriend NPCs from other worlds, support the complex community and ecosystem, and help solve problems that arise.

title: Rivage
description: Rivage is an immersive sci-fi puzzle adventure set aboard the A.R.E.S. space station trapped in a space phenomenon. Wake up as Miranda, forced to explore, solve intricate puzzles to unravel the fate of your missing crew.

title: Do Crimes!
description: Hey, how'd you find this game?? Do Crimes is an upcoming chaotic competitive co-op extraction game where you and your friends drop onto randomized islands and cause criminal mayhem - then try to escape before you're squashed by the law...or just give each other the finger. Do Crimes! Or Don’t!

title: Neath
description: Manipulate the turns of friend and foe alike in this Eldritch roguelike tactical RPG by the makers of Rogue Legacy. Ascend the inverted tower. Kill an indolent god. Control every "moment".

title: Total War: Warhammer III - Lords of the End Times
Dreamcore: Rabbit Hole
description: Explore liminal spaces that feel eerily familiar and fire the imagination, like a dream you’ve already visited.

title: Intervoid
description: INTERVOID is a tense co-op horror game with resource management elements. Delve into the dark depths of an abandoned subway, avoid dangerous anomalies, out-of-control trains, and manage your oxygen supply. Reach the heart of this oppressive place.

title: Serpent's Gaze
description: Serpent’s Gaze is a punishing 1-4 player co-op third-person action game where you fight tough enemies and relentless bosses, all while uncovering the secrets of an ancient desert.

title: Shield of Breaker
description: Shield of Breaker is a single-player Action-RPG set in a fantasy world. Protect your castle from endless waves of enemies and turn the tide of battle by deflecting their own blazing fireballs. Choose your hero, upgrade your powers,. Each victory unlocks your path to defend new lands in your realm.

title: Tome of the Damned
description: Tome of the Damned is a dark top-down roguelike where a cursed mage fights for freedom. Defeat castle guards, enhance weapons and spells. Enchanted weapons, elemental grimoires, ruthless bosses. Die, adapt, try again.

title: Pizzapocalypse 2
description: A 3D platformer with a pizza moveset that's accessible & engaging to all skill levels! Explore different countries, and put a stop to the evil corporation ruining Pizza!

title: Pingbert's Snow Ride
description: Slide, soar, and deliver! Join Pingbert, the upbeat penguin mail carrier, in Pingbert’s Snow Ride—a fast-paced, platformer where you'll slide down snowy slopes to deliver mail at high speed!

title: Fallosophy
description: Use just two buttons to climb a colossal pinball table spanning the history of western philosophy. Fallosophy is a minimalist game that turns pinball into a quiet struggle against gravity. No score. No tilts. No savers. Falling down means climbing back up again. Why climb? What does it all mean?

title: Pixplorer
description: Pixplorer is a top-down sandbox action-RPG. Explore biomes, conquer dungeons, craft, build, fight, mine, farm, catch fish and insects! Enjoy the game's atmosphere and complete freedom to shape your own adventure.

title: Everhome
description:
Become a sky architect in this relaxing, cozy, building and management sim. Meet charming characters and design unique houses just for them! Go shopping for new decorations, renovate their homes and discover the keys to their hearts.

Coming to steam in Q1 2026 -
storyline: Step into the shoes of a sky architect!

title: Merry Crisis
description: Three loves. One week. Zero chill. Merry Crisis is an intimate, character-driven romance visual novel about love, loss, and belonging—is home what you left behind, or where you’re headed?

title: Cafe of Roses
description: A lowkey, low stakes yuri story about a young woman and a mysterious maid. Who is the engimatic Magdalena, and is there more to her than meets the eye?

title: Maze Nightmare: Edge of Darkness
description: Maze Nightmare-Edge of Darkness is a first-person survival game. Trapped in a foggy, procedural maze, use limited ammo and faint breath sounds to locate the key-carrying zombie, find the key, and escape—or be lost forever.

title: Overtrick
description: A trick-taking roguelike with style! Outplay your rivals, purchase special abilities, and dazzle 1920s high society with your unstoppable cardplay. Call your contract, follow suit, flush trumps, and claim the hand. This isn't your grandma's bridge club... this is Overtrick!

title: Scam Line
description: Scam Line — a tense multiplayer game show for 4–8 players: bluffing, betrayal, and deadly traps. Forge fragile alliances, bluff your way through the host’s twisted trials, and fight to be the last one standing. Cheat. Be the last one standing

title: Paparazzi
description: Take sneaky pictures of the Stars, or find and eliminate the Paparazzis in this chaotic multiplayer game of stealth and social deduction.

title: Chrono Seoul
description: Chrono Seoul’s unique Turn Table combat lets you use the hero’s mechanical arm and future-reading ability to predict enemy actions and respond with precise attacks, defense, and evasion. Each run offers new patterns, and at every chapter’s end, an Existence corrupted Seoul awaits.

title: Gears Of Glory
description:
Gears of Glory is a movement-based Tower Defense where you drive a van across the map to collect Gears, build powerful towers, and stop the robots from destroying your bases.

Developed for PC, Gears of Glory combines classic Tower Defense strategy with a unique twist: driving a stylish van through the chaos of a post-apocalyptic world.

Featuring a top-down pixel art look and fast-paced gameplay, the player takes on the role of a resistance pilot tasked with protecting the last human bases from
storyline: The game takes place in a post-apocalyptic world where robots have taken over and forced humanity to live in isolation. After many years, humans finally managed to develop towers powerful enough to fight back. You are the protagonist of this story and, armed with these tools and your Gear Machine, you are tasked with saving humanity.

title: Blast Racer
description: "BLAST RACER" is an arcade-style bullet hell game. You’re humanity’s last hope. Drive an upgradable, transformable battle race car. Blaze through deadly tracks, dodge waves of bullets, and save the world in flames!

title: Wabisabi SushiDerby
description: Adorable sushi race at full speed in a training × racing game! Become a sushi chef, craft unique toppings, and enter your trained sushi into races. Don't forget to cheer on your sushi during the race. Win the prestigious S1 Cup championship, and become a top-tier sushi chef!

title: HoloVillage: Our Cozy Days
description: Farm, fish, mine, craft, and decorate your home in this cozy multiplayer life sim. Venture into dungeons and take on bosses outside the village for some added excitement. Share relaxing and thrilling moments alike with hololive talents as you shape your countryside life.

title: Avemary Rocket: Captain Patchwork
description: Join our brave captain on this action adventure in space! You'll be riding The Patchwork, a less than ideal spaceship, but enough to get away from pursuers. However, you'll be facing malfunctions, fires, enemies attacking... When it rains, it pours.

title: D
description: A new game from Parco Games.

title: The Streamer's Alt Account Labyrinth
description: A new collaboration by Acacia, the developers of Mahou Shoujo no Majo Saiban, and G-MODE. Explore dungeons and face a story of sickly sweetness, alt accounts, and a girl band with issues in The Streamer's Alt Account Labyrinth.
storyline:
The all-girl band Rag Drops is breaking out on social media with the vocalist of the century, Neon, taking the lead. But then ████████████. ██████████, “████” ███████████. Rag Drops is accused of heinous crimes.

“████████, it's your fault.”

The band is engulfed in an unprecedented firestorm. ███████―? Suspicion and doubt begin eating them alive when suddenly their smartphones begin to glow.

Welcome to the otherworld UraU, girls, where the dark side of social media materializes!

title: Saga & Seeker
description: From a consumer of stories to a creator of them. Saga & Seeker is a "storycrafting game" where you can generate endless tales with your favorite characters. The words you write become a part of the story itself in this immersive entertainment experience powered by your imagination.

title: Robot Recycler Ryn
description: Build your own custom combat robots, piece by piece! Weld, saw, and shape metal to perfection. Lead your creations into battle as you follow Ryn in Story Mode, or craft freely in Construction Mode.

title: Kindling Hour
description: A brief, atmospheric text adventure of flickering candlelight, forgotten memories, and a quiet search through the dark.

title: Deck of Harvest
description: Within a seasonal journey of harvest, plan limited fields, plant diverse seeds, reap bountiful crops, and amass wealth. Don't forget to manage your warehouse, select powerful treasures to build your deck, and become the ultimate farmer. Are you ready for this strategic challenge?

title: Z-Gyubaan!
description: Destroy the floor panel with the blast that defeated the enemy and rescue the captive girl! After destroying 75% of the panels, move on to the next stage.

title: Resequence: The Orchard
description: Resequence: The Orchard is an occult-horror adventure game in which school counselor Saito approaches an inexplicable phenomena through his counseling sessions with students.
storyline: Feeling extremely hard to move on after his wife’s missing and drained of the will to live, Kisuke Saito—encouraged by his colleague Aislinn and a high school girl Kaneko Honda—accepted the job as a school counselor. But every student who comes to him is plagued by inexplicable phenomena…

title: Sublustrum
description: Step into the space between subconscious and reality. Explore strange liminal worlds, solve sound-driven puzzles, and unravel the secrets behind the enigmatic device left by a vanished scientist.

title: Elemency Island
description: Elemency island is a cozy farm coop game. Plant, raise animals, sell your ressources to unlock technologies and automate your entire farm. Alone, or with your friends, come discover this island full of surprises and unknown creatures.

title: Amelorn
description: Recruit unique units, cast powerful spells, and conquer your enemies in a 2D fantasy strategy adventure. Tackle a challenging campaign or dive into Skirmish Mode to create and customize your own battles.

title: StarAbyss Heroes
description: Torn by an ancient cataclysm, the world lies in ruins. In this ARPG, play a hero exploring relics, looting treasures, forging weapons, and mastering skills on a decaying yet fantastical journey.

title: The Abyss Break
description: Hardcore first-person co-op horror extraction game. Explore the parallel worlds of the Abyss alone or with a team, gather resources, and make life-or-death decisions that will determine your survival.

title: Flap de Clap
description:
Take on Mount Snoepje by flapping your way up with up to three friends. Be careful not to bonk too much or you might end up at the very bottom again.
Hunt for highscores in the endless runner mode, dodging and defeating various enemies and bosses.

title: Lost Host
description:
Lost Host is a story-driven adventure puzzle game about a small toy car searching for its missing owner.
When the boy mysteriously disappears, the toy car begins a journey through the house and beyond, exploring dark rooms, hallways, foggy streets, and abandoned places while following clues to uncover what happened.

Players control the toy car as it navigates dangerous environments, solves physics-based puzzles, and interacts with objects to progress. The world is full of hazards for a tiny toy
storyline:
One night, a young boy disappears without a trace. His room is left quiet and still, except for a small toy car that suddenly comes to life. Unable to understand what happened to its owner, the car begins a lonely journey to find him.

Following scattered clues, the toy car travels through the house, exploring dark rooms, dusty corners, and forgotten spaces. As it moves further, the trail leads outside into the fog-covered streets and abandoned places of a large, mysterious world.

Along the way

title: Beware of Dog
description: Beware Of Dog is a fast paced Action Adventure game with RPG elements set in eclectic insane world where our heroes grandpa Domkrat and his faithful Dog embark on their journey to buy some meat.

title: The Melty Way
description: You move, you melt. Play as a brave size-shifting slime in this colorful precision puzzle-platformer, dashing through handcrafted puzzles and perilous traps on your journey in The Melty Way.

title: Völund
description: The forge remembers every strike. In VÖLUND, a blacksmithing roguelike, you shape raw ore into weapons of legend. Unearth cursed metals, master the ancient craft, and forge your path to immortality.

title: Timberflow: Sawmill Simulator
description: From a single tree to an entire industry! Manage and automate your lumber business in this relaxing, yet challenging Sawmill Simulator. Start small, grow rich, dominate the market.

title: Pop Pop Potato
description:
Pop Pop Potato is a rage game + 2D platformer where you blast yourself up the level with explosive corn kernels instead of jumping.

You lose control in the air, so wherever you land, that's it, even if it's the bottom of the level.

title: Momolitos
description: Explore vibrant zones, collect ingredients, and feed adorable Momolitos to help them evolve into hundreds of unique forms. A cozy creature-collecting adventure that blends exploration, discovery, and the joy of caring for your own lab full of curious life.

title: Vena
description: Roguelike deckbuilder meets hex-tile city builder! Build a resource engine to survive the center’s rising demands. Place producers, converters, and combo-rich tiles. Roll dice to shop, pick perks, and chase wildly different builds every run.

title: Woman Simulator
description: Experience life as a woman - cleaning, cooking, laundry, and no time to rest. Full immersion into the world of everyday chaos!

title: Midnight Scenes: Among Graves
description: When the graves stop whispering in your ear, it’s time for you to surrender to eternal silence. So says the Agreement, and so it must be fulfilled. Welcome to a new dimension of horror. Welcome to Midnight Scenes.

title: Cardaire: Eternal Aces
description: Get ready to crack packs and throw cards in Cardaire: Eternal Aces, a single-player collectible card RPG! Explore a unique world, hunt down powerful cards, and build the deck that'll make you a Cardaire legend.

title: Ergenekon
description: Ergenekon is a story-based, cinematic-heavy, linear, third person single player game about the Turkish epic Ergenekon. You will witness the resurrection of the Turks with Ergenekon.

title: Bourbon Risky
description: Bourbon Risky is a simple but deep boss rush action game with retro style graphics. Smash all enemies in your way with your eternal companion that blasting bullets and lasers!

title: Vision Quench
description: An online co-op dark fantasy looter shooter set in the underbelly of a consumer goods conglomerate mega dungeon. Within its halls you will fight ancient foes and modern horrors. Can you survive long enough to make it to the top?

title: The Dungeon Of Horror
description: A dark medieval-fantasy turn-based dungeon crawler where you try to escape the dungeon of your own creation! Place tiles, fight monster and cooperate with friends to find and destroy the pagan shaman Meir to escape this horror!
storyline:
You are a honorable member of the royal squad gathered by the Queen. Your mission is to find the lost king.

The trail leads you to the outskirts of the kingdom, where you decide to spend the night in an old village. It turns out to be a trap, and you wake up in a nightmare dimension!

title: TR-49
description: Narrative deduction meets audio drama, from the creators of Heaven’s Vault, Overboard! and A Highland Song.

title: Carmageddon: Rogue Shift
description: Carmageddon smashes back with brutal roguelite vehicular‑combat mayhem. Adapt, upgrade, and unleash destruction on post‑apocalyptic zombie hordes. The legacy lives on, reinvented and unforgiving.

title: Teko
description: Teko is an Indie Roguelike Deckbuilder where you have to reach the highest possible score by playing Poker hands, but in an unconventional way: making 3 combos at once.
storyline:
Every chip played counts! You won’t waste a single hand. Create your own strategies: each one offers a different way to win your runs. As you progress, you’ll unlock new ways to multiply your score and push your limits even further.

Manage your Pocket, delete Chips, buy Consumables, bet to earn more MONEY, gain perks for playing better, take risks, choose whether to save or spend it all, fight bosses, surpass the imposed limits, and pick the strategy that best fits what you find in the Shop! Th

title: Paccarat
description: The 10-rats-in-a-trenchcoat roguelike deckbuilder. Recruit a rag-tag team of rats, craft a curated deck for each, and discover devastating multi-deck combos. Build your team & masterfully pilot multiple unique decks to take down increasingly difficult enemies.

title: Daughter of the Rift
description: Daughter of the Rift is story-rich card-battling adventure with a unique deck-building progression system.

title: Dungeon of Departure
description: an independently developed, pixel art, visual novel set in an original universe which follows the silent, player protagonist and three companion characters as they struggle to find a way out of an increasingly puzzling, underground world.
storyline:
Dungeon of Departure is an independently developed, pixel art, visual novel set in an original universe. The story follows the silent, player protagonist and three companion characters as they struggle to find a way out of an increasingly puzzling, underground world.

Choices matter as your decisions can lead you through four unique story paths. Plus, throughout the journey, your team will be relying on your way-finding and map-making abilities, which will determine the success or failure of the

title: Erosion
description: Your daughter's been kidnapped. Every death costs you a decade. Explore a roguelike open world where your actions reshape the timeline. Join a cult, steal a ride, gamble Cheddar. Collect 100+ weapons and abilities, demolish destructible voxel dungeons. Can you save her before time steals her away?

title: Vampire Crawlers: The Turbo Wildcard from Vampire Survivors
description: Deal world-ending combos and blitz through infested dungeons! Vampire Crawlers: the turbo wildcard from Vampire Survivors is a casual, turnbased deckbuilder with roguelite elements. Master the Turboturn with your own hand of cards!

title: Echo Generation 2
description: Embark on a sci-fi deckbuilding RPG odyssey. Gather your crew, craft powerful decks, and battle across the stars to find your way home. Deal the cards. Defy the cosmos. Embrace the adventure.

title: Armatus
description: ARMATUS is a third-person roguelite shooter set in the demon-infested ruins of Paris. As the last supernatural warrior of an ancient order, armed with powerful firearms and incredible celestial powers, scour the city in search of a lost gateway to heaven - the Sunless Gate.

title: Magical Blush
description: Magical Blush is a top-down action-adventure where fast-paced elemental combat meets Metroidvania-style exploration. Chain spell combos, exploit elemental weaknesses, rescue survivors, and team up in local co-op as you battle the powerful Elemental Lords and explore the wondrous world of Wyn.

title: Strigoi Town
description: Combine your potions and refine your deck to withstand waves of vampires in a Compact Deck-Refiner where every card matters. Draft your starting deck, discover powerful effects by mixing flasks and recruit allies to uncover the dark mystery threatening your home.

title: Brightfall
description: Lived through the Plague, did you? Now try surviving till morning on an island erased from the maps. Gather, build, and fight to keep your light alive in Brightfall - a co-op open world survival-craft roguelite where the darkness wants to swallow you whole.

title: NodalBastion
description: Defend the last AI core in an abstract minimalist game of incremental progression, powerful skills, and evolving networks.
storyline:
The AI wars are over. You are the last intelligence — defending the final core against ever-evolving humanity.

Deploy nodes, expand your network, and neutralize endless hostile intrusions.

Harvest data and install upgrades to adapt with every iteration.

title: M.O.L.E.
description: Voices of the dead are calling you from deep below the earth. Pilot the Mole, a Soviet drilling vessel, in this PSX-style simulator-horror game set during the waning days of the cold war.

title: Threshold of Judgement
description: A mysterious gate judges your soul between Heaven and Hell. Answer wisely — fifteen truths lead to salvation, one mistake to eternal damnation.

title: Shardpunk 2
description: The Empire may have fallen, but humanity continues the fight. Shardpunk 2 puts you in command of a human outpost in this potent mix of turn-based tactical strategy, RPG, survival and resource management as you gather your team, scavenge for resources and prepare for a new, evolving threat.

title: Tales of Berseria Remastered
description:
Tales of Berseria returns with enhanced graphics and optimized gameplay!

Engage in the ultimate quest for self-discovery, remastered for the first time. The sacred kingdom awaits the arrival of its savior, and a lone woman named Velvet is marked by traumatic deceit. Join Velvet on her journey for vengeance, along with her cast of eccentric companions, as they sail through the archipelago which comprises the kingdom of Midgand

title: Imagine Future
description: "Imagine Future" is a Visual Novel with a campus theme. You will follow the perspective of the protagonist Ji Wang, experience the life of a high school student. The final examination seemed so far away. one day, it was close at hand. Standing at the crossroads of life, what choice will you make?

title: Doomed Crew
description: Co-op Horror for 1-4 players. Dive into a brutal corporate environment, complete deadly objectives for your promised freedom. Trust nothing.

title: Athelan Battlegrounds
description: Athelan Battlegrounds is a free-to-play, turn-based tactics game with no meta progression and no pay-to-win. It's a game made for players who thrive in a skill-based competitive environment. A game that promises to be easy to learn but incredibly difficult to master! Build your team of champions and engage in unique matches against players or AI!
storyline:
War was once absolute. Civilizations rose and fell. Entire worlds, brimming with unrealized potential, snuffed out all because another world was lucky enough to have evolved early. Survival wasn't due to ingenuity or persistence, but simply due to who built their war machines first. That was before the Veyrathi intervened.

Before they became the architects of the Cosmic Law, they were scientists, explorers, dreamers. Similar to most other intelligent life across the stars. They were a species c

title: Corinne
description: Navigate Corinne through a realm of pixel horrors, surrounded by neighbors that are turning into bloodthirsty monsters. Discover the secrets of this twisted dimension before it's too late for Corinne and her friends.
storyline:
Trapped in an apartment building with neighbors that turn into monsters...

When some shocking murders happen in Corinne's apartment complex, the entire building gets teleported to a hell dimension. Corinne needs to escape before she and the other residents start losing their humanity and transforming into monsters.

To stay human, Corinne needs to talk to others, something she really isn't good at. She'd rather just stay inside her apartment, where it's safe.

But to survive, she'll need to esc

title: Pieces of the Kingdom
description: What if Chess…was a roguelite? Assemble your party and battle your way across a broken kingdom in a fantastical, tactical take on Chess. Loot epic gear, recruit powerful pieces with unique abilities, and strategize your way to victory.

title: The Doodle Palette
description: A cozy sandbox for building and painting miniature worlds. Place, paint, and decorate while tiny people and birds bring your dioramas to life.

title: Imperial Bureaucracy Hero
description: IBH is a rich role playing game at the end of time. You're a mid-level official in a dying sci-fi regime, given the impossible task of fixing a faltering machine; explore a vast world, define your mind, flex your authority, and become a sinner or a savior in countless other stories.

title: Abyssal Anarchy
description: A fast-paced co-op spell-hell where each map pulls you deeper into the Abyss. Choose from 5 heroes and 14 spells, unlock upgrades, and survive alone or with friends as the magic grows wilder with every descent.

title: Spectral Report
description: Enter abandoned locations as Spectral Reporters to prove the existence of ghosts. But beware: sanity is fragile, and not everything you see is real. Cooperate with your team, investigate the place, take evidences, and finally prove that ghosts are real.

title: TownsFolk
description: Guide your people through ruin—build, survive, and let every choice shape their fate. Rekindle the light of a forgotten world.

title: Little Squirrel Cabin
description:
Little Squirrel Cabin is a 2D pixel-art survival horror game with psychological elements and dynamic storytelling.
Every new dawn can change your situation.
Nights are harsh, your sanity is fragile, and local traders have their own interests.
storyline:
In view of the increasing reports of emergencies, the OSI is compelled to respond immediately.

According to preliminary data, a significant threat to the existence of nearby settlements has been identified in sector H16.

There are confirmed disappearances of living organisms — from insects to citizens themselves. The uniform decline in numbers rules out a rise in predator populations, since all species are disappearing simultaneously and to the same extent.

The local police do not possess suf

title: Gothic Scythe
description: An high-difficulty action game where you must slip past your enemies attacks and crush them. Take back the city controlled by homunculus with your scythe.

title: Faro
description: Faro is an immersive visual novel set on a sunless planet. Everyone tries their best to survive in these barren lands. Make your choices as you set forth into this unforgiving world.

title: Guilty Pleasures
description: You are Marcus Holmes, a young private detective and nephew of the legendary detective Arthur Holmes, known among the elite as the “Detective of Passion” — a man who uncovered the intimate secrets of the rich and famous: affairs, love triangles, model disappearances, scandals in high society.

title: Caribbean Legend: Age of Pirates
description: You are the captain and owner of your own ship—the finest fate one could hope for in the 17th century Caribbean. Unlimited sandbox experience. A unique genre blending naval combat, land exploration, and global map. Think Sid Meier's Pirates! meets Bannerlord.

title: The Last Poem
description:
5 years have passed since then.
The sequel to "Christmas Tina" by the original team.
Here and now. A "Chinese" and a "Japanese" meet once more in a non-romantic encounter. At the end of the century, a journey begins—from the first (her) to the last (her)...

title: Drillbound
description: Drillbound is a short incremental game about mining your way to the planet’s core. Crush layers of rock, gather resources, upgrade your drill, and unlock powerful technologies as you descend into the depths.

title: Escape From Ruin: Greymart Simulator
description: A post-apocalyptic loot-fight-extract survival game with escape-style raids by day and black-market shop management by night. Fans of Tarkov-like gameplay — and players who love running management sims — will feel right at home.

title: Dumpling
description: DUMPLing is a fast-paced top-down survival shooter with a metroidvania twist. Pulled into the strange land of DUMPL, you’ll explore tunnels in platformer perspective, fight dumpling-like enemies in top down perspective, and uncover a bizarre story about food, friendship, and survival.

title: Cocoboy
description: COCOBOY is a 2D puzzle platformer within a 3D retro gaming simulation. Hack an ’80s cult classic with modded abilities, decorate your bedroom with rare collectibles, and scour a 2005 gaming forum where a peculiar fandom takes root.

title: Orrin's Chessboard
description: A unique tower defense game where you build defenses on a dynamic board to repel enemies. Experience the thrill of strategy with an extraordinary degree of freedom.

title: Agerasia
description: Eight time periods from across human history collide in a competitive bid to stop the end of the world. Go from fighting monsters to solving a murder, dating sim to escape game. Experience seven vastly different routes in a bid to solve the mystery as to why you've all been brought together.

title: Starbump
description: Starbump combines fast-paced action, Third Person platforming and competitive modes in vibrants worlds. It’s designed for party nights where you and your friends battle it out for hours, packed into colorful arenas and quick-fire game modes. It's a pure cozy brawl !

title: Ride 6
description: Live the thrill of asphalt and dirt with RIDE 6: affirm your biker identity by joining RIDE Fest, race with 250+ bikes from different categories and prove you're the best by challenging real motorcycling legends.

title: Scraps of the Machine
description: FPS Mech Action! Pilot a mass of steel through a single player campaign set in a desolate landscape. Target enemy armor or weapons to wear them down piece by piece, find upgrades to improve your mech or change its loadout, and survive in a world of rust and decay. Discover, Destroy, Scavenge.

title: Tomorrowness
description: Take flight as Juno, a small bird guided by the sound of her guitar through a hand-drawn world of music and memory. Play melodies to solve puzzles, fly through unique platforming challenges and piece together a story of grief and love.

title: Triarchy
description: Sail your ship, explore islands, fight monsters, choose your abilities, and craft legendary gear to hunt for deadly bosses. Play Triarchy your way! Activate Boss Challenge Modes or enable Assists to suit your playstyle. Open-world, Co-op, Action Adventure (1-3 Players)

title: Rizz Dungeon: Skeleton Key to My Heart
description: Fighting is hard, right? Let your party do it for you! Romance Monster Girls and traverse the Dungeon! Hopefully they'll all get along... right?

title: Knights of Fiona
description: Fierce dragons have emerged in the land of Gallia. Join Fiona and her sworn knights to protect the kingdom! Embark on quests solo or with friends as you fight against the darkness.

title: Orcs Must Die! By the Blade
description:
The orcs are back—louder, dumber, and smellier than ever. And this time… they’re in your face. Literally!

Orcs Must Die: By The Blade brings the legendary trap-slaughter franchise into fully immersive VR. Become a War Mage and defend Stormwreck Island in an all-new story as rotten rifts unleash corrupted orcs. Swing swords, trigger trinkets, punch orcs in the snout, and set ingenious trap chains that rocket screaming orcs across the room, pop off limbs, and spray gooey carnage everywhere.

Expl

similarGames.name: Anima: Gate of Memories - The Nameless Chronicles

title: Mini Shopkeeper
description: Run your cozy little shop from the bottom of your screen, decorate to attract unique customers, hire assistants, and send adventurers for rare treasures - all in a lively, charming management sim!

title: Rotato
description: Spin. Shoot. Survive.

title: Trails in the Sky 2nd Chapter
description: A remake of the second installment in the main Trails series, serving as a direct sequel of Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter. The game follows Estelle as she sets out on a new adventure following the events of the previous game, where she will be joined by comrades both old and new.
storyline:
After quelling the coup d'état that shook the Kingdom of Liberl, Estelle and Joshua have finally become senior bracers. However, on the eve of the Queen's Birthday Festival, Joshua reveals the dark truth of his past before vanishing into the night, leaving only his brief farewell: "Goodbye, Estelle."

Armed with Joshua's harmonica and an unshakable determination, Estelle embarks upon a continent-spanning quest to find her partner. During her journey, she must take on the sinister society of Ouro

title: The Maze
description: In a pitch dark maze like factory, you must avoid He, secure secret documents, and escape with only a flashlight. If He finds you, He’ll charge from the dark with an axe. Can you survive and escape?

title: Wandering Sword
description:
The hit pixel-art RPG set in the world of Chinese martial arts is finally coming to PlayStation!
Play as a young swordsman gravely injured after being caught in a violent conflict.
Having narrowly escaped death, you set out on a journey to master the martial arts and fulfill your destiny as a true hero in a vast wuxia world.
Includes Original DLC
All DLC released on other platforms is included:
“Immortal Trails Across the Blue Sea”
“Mount Pack: The Supreme Steed”

title: BlazBlue: Entropy Effect X
description: In BlazBlue Entropy Effect X, you’ll face off against surging hordes across ever-shifting dimensions in an action-focused roguelike platform adventure. The Sea of Possibility is envisioned as a descent through multiple levels, each filled with threats you’ll need to suppress while harvesting Shards of Possibility. Along the way, you’ll uncover a completely new, original story that expands the BlazBlue Entropy Effect X universe in unexpected ways. Read the swarm, weave through danger, and strike

title: BrokenLore: Ascend
description: BrokenLore: Ascend is a first-person psychological horror with climbing and stealth mechanics. Follow Ren and Yui, two rooftop climbers facing a cursed tower and the terrifying Rokurokubi. The higher they climb, the closer they get to madness—and to the truth about themselves.

title: Dynasty Warriors: Origins - Visions of Four Heroes
description: This DLC adds new stories featuring the Four Heroes, new allies, weapons, and more. The immersive battlefields and exhilarating 1 vs. 1,000 action return!

similarGames.name: Nights of Azure 2: Bride of the New Moon

title: Hop & Seek
description: Hop & Seek is a multiplayer egg hunt game set in a game show for Easter bunnies. You can hide eggs, seek eggs and trick your friends.

title: The Diamond Adventures
description: The Diamond Adventures is a multi-genre, single-player adventure game packed with minigames and exploration. DanTDM is taken back through the old eras of his YouTube journey, allying with old friends and facing old foes as he makes his way through the memories into the present day.

title: Bingo Betty
description: This ain't your average grandma's bingo! Put your bingo skills to the test in this strategic roguelite spin on the classic game as you collect items, customize cards, create combos, cash in scratch tickets, and take betty to the top!

title: Last Shinobi
description: Dive into a tactical roguelike where every decision counts. Build a unique strategy, unlock new skills and companions, and refine your synergies. Each level is a strategic puzzle to solve. No deck, minimal randomness, only strategic choices.

title: Saint Slayer: Spear of Sacrilege
description: Saint Slayer is an NES-style 2D action game, featuring loads of stages, enemies, and gore set against the backdrop of late-17th century Europe. Play as the ex-soldier Rudiger and wield the Spear of Sacrilege as you save the Holy Roman Empire from the corrupt Catholic priest Father Pacer.

title: Animal Bakery
description: Manage a cozy subway bakery in an underground animal city - run by a "retired" gangster you're secretly investigating. Serve cute locals, expand the bakery, prepare for festivals, meet strange visitors and explore the subway after hours for fun stories and special rewards!

title: Etrange Overlord
description: Join Étrange on this musical odyssey as she seeks to conquer hell in the pursuit of living her best afterlife.

similarGames.name: Nights of Azure 2: Bride of the New Moon
